website_summaries.verdict: If you don’t mind adding hot water to this model before you dip your toes in, its soothing bubble massage and streamlined design are worth the low price of entry.
pros: Convenient to operate with your toes
cons: it's a good idea to protect the floor with a towel or mat

customer_reviews.title: Had this for a little over a month. Used ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a little over a month. Used it 2 times and now it doesn’t work, no bubbles or heat. I guess you get what you pay for! If I could give it no stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Munger

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess. It doesn't really keep the water very warm. It bubbles but they're very gentle bubbles so it doesn't make your feet feel good. They're just there. The splash guard doesn't really protect from splashes and more water splashes from the back than the front anyway. It's very mediocre. Plus the instructions say you can only use it for 30 mins. But the warning tag say only use for 15 mins. I don't love the mixed messages.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep water warm.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in today and immediately wanted to use it. The bubbles are great but it does not keep water warm at all, which is why I chose this one. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother...
customer_reviews.text: No bubbles, no jets... just vibrates a little... giant waste of money....pretty sure it’s broken right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep water warm.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought unit because it claimed to keep water warm..it doesn’t at all. Bubbles/vibrations work ok.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sheahan

customer_reviews.title: I love using it with a little tea tree oil added ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not heat up the water but it does keep the water warm enough to soak for about 15 mins. I love using it with a little tea tree oil added as it is very relaxing and is great to use before giving myself a pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Just What You'd Think
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I expected/wanted in a foot bath. Nothing fancy about it, but also not cheapy either. Happy to have one around the house for those days where my feet need a soak.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Critelli

customer_reviews.title: Keeps temp but does not massage
customer_reviews.text: Maintains temp and stone is convenienty located however I automatically thought it is was a massager and it is not.
customer_reviews.author: My Ama

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for good product. Could be better if controls for heat and bubbles were separate. My size 11 fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hahm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep the Heat
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t keep the heat and i started with SCALDING water and after 5 min- lukewarm. This is the second foot bath ( different make and model) and I’ve come to the realization these foot baths can’t keep heat- I’ll keep because I’m tired of sending another one back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimper

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable product
customer_reviews.text: Product motor stopped working after a month. I already threw the box away so guess I’ll put it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelangelo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: O stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because it implied there was a heat maintenance button, it does not warm the water. It also implied it was a messager and it is not. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good foot spa for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice foot spa for the money. Strong bubbles and you can’t go wrong with the price. Doesn’t keep the water hot but keeps it warmish. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for an anniversary surprise, a little home spa day. Soak in this, then pedicure. It Does a pretty good job of keeping the water warm, so it is actually enjoyable for a decent period. I add it in very hot then wait for it to be just cool enough for feet. Then it is pleasurably warm prob 10-15 more minutes. I’ve added a small amount of epsom salt (not recommended by manufacturer). Make sure you wash the salt out thoroughly after use. Combine it with some o’keeffes foot repair cream after and your feet will love you. Or your significant other’s fee, whichever :)
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Not Warm Enough, but Great Spa, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The spa is a good one for its price. However, the water doesn't stay hot so make sure to use hot water in the beginning. The bubbles are relaxing and very calming. Nice addition to a family spa day. Definitely going to be doing this more because Lord, I did not know how much I needed this. The cleaning process is very easy. Pour out the water and wipe it down. I wouldn't advise using anything like epsom salt or oils in the spa because it is harder to clean. Overall great product for a simple feet soaking session and weekly self-care routine.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Great...for one day of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my fiancé to use to soak his feet after a long day of work. The first time, the product worked great and with no issue. However, during the second use it stopped working entirely. We followed the directions and made sure not to use it longer than instructed, and it died entirely. I feel like for the price it should have worked more than once, and I might as well have purchased a large bucket for cheaper. I’m very disappointed in the quality of this product. I wish it were different as it was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten tired of spending $40 on a professional pedicure every month so trying them at home seems like a welcomed alternative. This product does what it’s supposed to do: clean and soften my feet. It’s easy to dump out afterwards and a snap to clean. Stores easily and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bee 🐝 Pantry

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this unit is supposed to keep water warm. Well, it certainly does NOT do that. I will use for home pedis rather than return... but this was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Parker

customer_reviews.title: No heat, loud
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I was able to fit my size 13 feet inside . Description is misleading . I was under impression tat the water would get hot as u use this . NOPE . Loud as well . Will b returning n just keep dumping hot water in regular foot bucket for my tired/athletic feet .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat water.
customer_reviews.text: “Heat Maintenance” is misleading terminology. It is a plastic tub that uses air to make bubbles. Heat maintenance is no better than the simple plastic soaking tubs. It is not insulated and has no heating element. It is an ok foot soaker if you start with hot water and like bubbles, but the water cools quickly, just like bath water. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dolcevita09

customer_reviews.title: Relief for aching feet
customer_reviews.text: I somehow inherited my grandmother's bad feet that were made even worse by six years of retail work walking on concrete. My feet ache and throb all the time so this was a great solution. It's easy to use, easy to clean. I use a half cup of Epson salt when my feet ache and after 20 minutes of soaking, the bubbles and the built in foot massage get me back on my feet. It also comes with a handy little pumas stone to get rid of dead, dry skin. Best gift I ever received!
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Great for soaking sore feet!
customer_reviews.text: I soak my feet in an Epsom salt hot water to work soreness out. I'm not fond of the bubbler, which is so strong that it shoots water droplets out onto the floor. Also, the item description both online and in the accompanying booklet states that if you start with the water, the heating element will keep it at that temperature. Not true! By the time I have a 10 min. soak, the water is feeling pretty cool. But it's as good as others I've tried, and not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kanitabc

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for the price, I like the removable pumice stone. I like that it bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Well it makes the bubbles but definitely didnt keep the water heated. I put hot water in and the moment i turned the spa on it rapidly began to cool. A regular non mechanical foot spa would be more effective.
customer_reviews.author: RogueRain

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the description strongly suggests that this heats the water - IT DOES NOT. Otherwise, it's decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: After a long day of hard work,this foot spa is the perfect remedy. It’s is very relaxing an spacious for my feet. I like to include my fAvorite great smelling,foot bath salts that leave my feet feeling refreshed and smooth. This bath is so great that the family can not resist seeing my soak my feet ,they all ask for a try . This bath is easy to clean and anyone will appreciate this as a gift! It’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Lace Royalty Wig Store

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I use it every other day!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little loud but nothing crazy. You can't expect such a tiny engine to be soundproofed and still be an affordable product. It definitely gets the job done. The water takes longer to get cold. I wish it would be a bit more efficient at maintaining temp but it's a cheap and reliable spa.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This item was obviously not just opened BUT USED!
customer_reviews.text: OH my goodness I am in shock. I just got this footbath which box is not only previously opened but used. You can feel inside and visually see a "ring" around the basin because it was USED. WOW, goodness lord, not even trying to repackage .......That is nasty. The pumice stone has even been used. Baggie with stone obviously dirty, picture shows previous opening and darn no attempt to reseal. It's like this was returned and sat in a warehouse until I ordered. Sorry but all I can say shocking and I am blown awayI Richard Wyvill
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eric Wyvill

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of one pedicure for my husband, we have a toenail solution. He never really liked to get pedicure at the salons. Just heat up the water first, pour into the small tub and add epsom salts or whatever. We had it on for about 15 minutes and it was still hot. Nice bubbles. Bought the blue model, not too girlish. Just be careful not to fill too high as the feet have to go in it.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: It warns you to let product cool off before cleaning... it does not keep warm... it doesnt get warm. my water was cold within 2 minutes. The bubbles are super weak, there is no massage feeling at all like advertised... its VERY noisy, I wouldn't mind if the noise served a purpose... it is NOT splash proof. I had a puddle of water underneath the machine. I am not happy with this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: WAY Noisey
customer_reviews.text: It is very noisey to run the heater which also runs with bubble but if you don't want the bubbles you don't have a choice .... so I cranked up my TV ... BUT it doesn't really keep the water warm because the air blowing through the water for the bubbles is COLD, not heated so it chills the water faster than it keeps it heated .... rather funny. I am not sending back though - It is more comfortable than my old pan so I will simply heat my own water and use without the noise ... ur bubbles and cooler. Two stars for the comfortable design.
customer_reviews.author: fairenough

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: ...and what you pay for is a piece of equipment that leaks all over the floor, let's the water get cold, and is awkward to drain. More work than it was worth. Pay a little more for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lizaderp

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. I should specifically say that the category of warmth does not apply, since it's not heated. It works just fine and the directions indicated you shouldn't use it for more than 30 minutes at a time because of possible overheating, but I sometimes forget - it's so comfortable and I'm reading a book or something - that I may go 40 minutes sometimes, but this seems to not be a problem. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: The heating system did't work well
customer_reviews.text: The foot bath is easy to use. Just fulfill it with warm water and plug in. Actually, I do feel comfortable when I first use it. However it becomes very cold soon after about 10mins. I think the heating system didn't work well. Only the bubble system is working. I have to change water by myself which shows no difference using regular foot bath(non-electronic one). I feel a little disappointed about it. Anyway it is a cheap product so maybe I should not expect too much!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: If it can keeping warm for a long time will be perfect but still awesome in all! Highly recommend and it is cheaper I bought 3 for family
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. Its very loud
customer_reviews.text: This is no better than using a plastic bin. Actually it's worse, because its very loud. It's a waste of money. It doesn't do more than a plastic tub would do.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Empie

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything.
customer_reviews.text: So. You cannot use anything that creates bubbles as the machine will quickly bubble over, however the motion isn’t strong enough to benefit my feet. The machines water will quickly become cold as this machine does not have a built in heater for the water. I should have listened to the unhappy reviews. It can work if you just want a machine to soak your feet in for a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: At home spa
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get chance to go to the salon and get my nails done so I decided to do it at home. This foot spa is great. It has a little hole on the bottom that sends the water with force and giving you a little massage. I am not sure how long it will last as I use it once every week for me and my husband. I will update if it breaks to have any other functionality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Deeply

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Motor is noisy so makes your spa session not as relaxing. Bubbles are very light have no soothing effect. Better off just to buy a plain foot bucket and soak feet in peace (no motor noise and fake jet bubbles)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles, Vibrates, but doesn't keep the water warm at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago. I have used it twice and as many of the reviews here have stated...it doesn't keep the water warm. It states on the inside of the tub that it will keep warm water warm but not warm up cold water. If you use the motor for the bubbles and vibration...the water goes cold within 3-5 minutes. I am returning this and will be purchasing a tub that has a temperature readout so I know that the heating aspect of the tub actually works.
customer_reviews.author: J Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not best for massaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item but would be better deeper to cover ankle also. Doesn't keep water warm long. Bubble jets are nice but doesn't massage that much. Nice to soak feet for about 15 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G.

customer_reviews.title: Just get a bucket.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice. I am very disappointed that it does not keep the water warm AT ALL which was the feature listed that made me decide to purchase this. There’s no need to purchase this product to find out you can have your foot bath needs met by just putting some hot water in a bucket and wiggling your toes.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Oooh, da little piggies hurt!!! Oh relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! I got this for my hubby and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie  Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Hot water gets cold fast.
customer_reviews.text: There is no heating of hot or warm water and within a very few minutes the water was cold. If any type of foot soap (like Johnson's foot soap) or crystals are used the bubbles create too much foam and it spills over a lot. I already donated mine to charity finding it useless and of no value to me.
customer_reviews.author: ROJ92

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Price was great and the bath is similar to when I go to a salon. Great convenience! Haven"t used it as yet but will update review as time progresses. I have tested it and it works so far.
customer_reviews.author: Balla

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend for the bubble option
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a while ago. It was there on the box til last night I decided to take a break and soak my feet and enjoy the bubbles. It's easy to set up works well as a soaker but if you are buying because of the bubble option then don't just go for the regular soaker. Bubble motor ONLY works if you keep the button pressed at all times. It won't stay on so if you are looking to sit back and enjoy the bubbles on your feet then this is not what you are looking for but a bucket and a long straw for you to make your own bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Víctor

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep water warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the price. I Wanted a foot spa that stayed warm this one does not. You get what you pay for all in all its not bad just not what I really was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie gunter

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want anything fancy so this unit is perfect. It doesn't heat the water, but keeps the warm water I put in warm long enough for my use. Easy to use and to clean. The tub is wide enough for big feet to fit. Sometimes I don't even plug it in. Works fine for me and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap and loud
customer_reviews.text: It makes a pretty loud noise, so good luck relaxing. It doesn't really vibrate anything and maybe I did not read the product review very well, but it doesn't keep the water warm or anything. Probably would allow this to be a kid item vs an adult item....not very luxurious or relaxing. It'll do for the price point. Next time spend the money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I love it! I put hot/ warm water and it stayed nice and warm throughout my whole at home pedicure, that I give my self. It gives a good amount of bubbles too. This is my first time using it and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Better price on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I would love to get this as a gift it’s a great gift for anyone to be honest I only bought it because I needed something for my feet since all salons are closed. It is kind of bulky but it works great. Also bed bath and beyond sells this for $70 which is insane
customer_reviews.author: Delwara

customer_reviews.title: Big feet fit lol
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to help with the really bad callus on his feet. Unboxing was easy and his size 14 feet actually fit! The bubbles are nice, I haven’t tried it myself but after soaking his feet in this with a few tbsp of epsom salt it really helped. And the pumice stone is pretty nice too and the handles help to hold it. Not sure how to get a replacement for that once its done. By the way, you have to pour in your own hot or warm water and when it gets cold you have to manually change the water out yourself. Not complaining, just explaining. Still five stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This item does not warm the water as advertised, and it does not bubble as advertised. The window closed before I could return it because the Shelter In Place order kept us from giving it to the recipient earlier. So, don't waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: SandyMouat

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and works well. Using it for my pandemic pedicures
customer_reviews.text: This foot bath is excellent. I bought this during the pandemic so I could do my own pedicures. Luxurious and inexpensive. The bubble so great. Helpful hint do not put bubble bath in the foot bath it will bubble over the top. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christinediane

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive. No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I now understand what everyone meant when they stated that this foot spa is a bit loud... it’s true. But, it’s not obnoxious! It does the job, I have no complaints. For what it is, and with the price being inexpensive... I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Antha

customer_reviews.title: foot spa
customer_reviews.text: i couldn't figure out how to adjust the temperature but it seemed to maintain the temp of the water so put the right temp of water in when you start
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term bubble soak only
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend. Heat doesn't work. It was gifted after the return period ended so we couldn't even get help about it. The minuscule bubbles going through it cool the water after about 10 minutes. The only way to clean it is to pour water over it. I suppose it's good for a very short term soak. Decided just to use salts and oils until the thing dies. Won't buy again, but I'm making the best of a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Boulley

customer_reviews.title: Foot soaker tub.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for a foot soak but it doesn't keep water warm at all. Just an average product.
customer_reviews.author: Heike Doiron

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it twice and both times the motor just shut off...I made sure the water level was right and the power was on and it was plugged in...also the jets are very weak so it more so tickles the feet than massages them
customer_reviews.author: V. Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's really good, though it doesn't have a heating system as stated on the description. Once you poor the hot water it get cool quite fast with the bubbling effect so it doesn't remain warm for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Very Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bubbles. Stays warm long enough for me. Feels great. Add favorite oils for extra pampering.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: best for price
customer_reviews.text: I usethis for my clients with basin liners. it seems to be good. i love homedics brand, and i trust it. ALL my clients love this. only thing that could be better is if iit had a heater...
customer_reviews.author: Tandanda Home Spa Services

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: the price is amazingly low and this product is great. i put epsom salts and vinegar in the machine and it still works!!!! i fell asleep with my feet in it and it still works!!!!!!! i woke up 9 hours later with my feet in soothing warm bubbles!!! this does not heat the water ....... it maintains the temperature or close to it....... great product
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Affordable no frills
customer_reviews.text: At the price point, this foot bath is perfect. I didn’t have high expectations being it was so cheap. It puts out a decent amount of bubbles. I don’t think that it maintains the water temperature though. It’s also quite loud
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you need
customer_reviews.text: if you just need a foot soaker, then this works just fine for that, easy to clean easy to put away. if you are looking for something with a vibrating motion and bubbles then no this won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: To small for a mans foot also this company doesn’t tell you BUT YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR RETURNS. Which in this case was 75% of purchase price. I’ll never purchase from this company again BUYER BE WARE
customer_reviews.author: suzanne toale

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LITTLE FOOT SPA
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED FOR MY MOTHER, AND USED IT THE FIRST TIME AND HAD GOOD RESULTS. THE WATER STAYED WARM, AND THE VIBRATION WAS SOOTHING. I ONLY WISHED THERE WAS A SETTING WITHOUT THE VIBRATION LIKE HER LAST ONE, BUT OTHERWISE, SHE ENJOYED IT.
customer_reviews.author: BabyB

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend as she kept telling me how badly she wanted one. she was in love right away. she said her feet feel great, it was easy to use, easy to clean, and light.
customer_reviews.author: jessica destromp

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for my boyfriend, but let's be honest, it's also for myself. Heavenly! Warms the water and the bubbles are so soothing. Haven't used the pumice stone yet, but love that it's an option!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Loud, and messy.
customer_reviews.text: Its loud, and messy. It has a humm louder then my sisters truck in the drive way. The jets are so strong it shoots water out of the tub and yes I stayed within the fill line. Yes you can put down a towel and you'd be fine but I had a rag to dry up my feet afterwards. So needless to say first use was a flop. This was the cheapest footspa I could find. So I'll probably work out the kinks until I get more money together to buy a better one. Idk the noise might not be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Deserve An Amazon #1 Rating
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for just soaking your feet, but the heat doesn't function and the bubbles are very weak. It's cheap and doesn't rate the #1 position by Amazon. It's been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Foot Spa
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful foot spa, simple, easy to use and clean at a great price. It was delivered very quickly. I give this product and seller my highest recommendation
customer_reviews.author: J. davis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is great for after a workout. All you need to do is throw in some Epsom salts. Set your feet and let it go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lane

customer_reviews.title: Bubble foot soak.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could add something to the bath. Directions indicate no. I wish the bubbles were a little more. However, for the price, the bath works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I can say that the jets are strong but that's about it. Really doesn't keep the water hot for anytime at all. Big enough to fit a size 11 foot I would guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ven

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Does the job dine but water still cools down to fast than I'd like. I dont think the heating element actually does much if anything but it fits my feet (11 mens) and the vibration feature and jets are nice
customer_reviews.author: Isaak McKee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bubbly foot spa. It's perfect for relaxing or those in between times at the day spa. It's easy to use and clean up is a breeze. Great value for the price. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Foot Spa
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift from my husband. So nice after a long day of standing on your foot. Comes with a pedicure stone. Best gift I received in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible for the price
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers were right. You get what you pay for. It's not too bad it's a step up from just a bucket of water. Just ice water helps my foot pain somewhat so it's not too bad. The bubbles aren't too strong but foot bath I had before just vibrated so it's a little better. But like I said I like I've water for my feet and there's no option to turn the heat on or off so it heats up the water a bit. It's also pretty loud
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rose

customer_reviews.title: waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: dont even bother buying this. just soak your feet in your bath tub or you’ll have to spend $15 JUST TO RETURN IT
customer_reviews.author: very unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and water stays warm, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I’m on the loves it, have so tired feet several times a week! Just when I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it, I think
customer_reviews.text: my wife said she wanted one, this was affordable, she seems to like it, and I am not in the dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E Long, Pistol Instructor, Freedom Ranch Pistol Academy, Bristow, OK  ccw-ok

customer_reviews.title: Not For Diabetics
customer_reviews.text: The writeup on Amazon did not indicate this should not be used by diabetics. However, when I opened the package and read the instructions it said diabetics shouldn't use it. Being an insulin dependent diabetic, I would not have bought it if the description had stated this. Due to Covid the retirement home I am in is on lockdown, so there is no way I can return it for a refund. Not a happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hinton

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to keep his feet up, but it doesn’t stay warm for no more than 10 minutes. I put warm water in as directed, but it began turning cold so fast. Really disappointed, but Amazon worked compensation for the issue. Nothing against Amazon, but I wouldn’t sell this product as a gift. It won’t even last a day.
customer_reviews.author: Aali Yah

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I use my spa every other day and I use the bubbler every time. It works well, and does what a foot spa should.
customer_reviews.author: CW Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Water doesn't stay as hot as I would like. Not bad but Wil get a better one when I need a new one
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Hott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This foot spa is amazing!!!! It’s Simple, bubbly and feels great with hot water. I add different varieties at times, if it’s baking soda, essential oils or just plain.... this machine is well worth the price and everything came as described!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brandl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great and does a good job massaging my foot. Wish it had heating. But with warm water works just great
customer_reviews.author: Iris Randle

customer_reviews.title: This ain't it chief
customer_reviews.text: It says that it heats and provides bubbles, but it only really bubbles. No heat whatsoever. Get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it says it maintains heated water but it doesn't. The bubbles feel nice but that is all that is nice about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. The on/off button broke the first time I used this. I don’t notice it keeping the water warm. Bubbles are nice. Sorta loud... but I guess it is pretty cheap and has a bit more functionality than a basic bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t keep the temperature hot, but if you put your desired water temperature in there it’s great. Simple to use and simple to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, important to know that you must put your own temped water. Does not have a heater. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: NYY MONTANA

customer_reviews.title: Who needs to go to the spa when you have this at home
customer_reviews.text: The hubby loves this. Uses it every day after work. After working on your feet all day this is a huge comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Witt

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work, first time I used it and and only worked for 5 seconds after that didn’t work anymore I am returning it and getting another one better DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Nasagoch

customer_reviews.title: Not what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this as a gift from my boyfriend so I hate to not leave a 5 star review but... The jets are loud making it hard to watch TV at the same time. The jets also tickle my feet rather than massage them. The little foot scrubber doesn't like to stay in the hole. Sometimes it pops out on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: foot tub
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice tub but its loud i thought it wld be soothing its started out quiet then it got loud..wont buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lavish Me

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the money its an ok product. I bought it because it was inexpensive. It's very light, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wall

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet spa bubble bath.
customer_reviews.text: I love my my foot bubble bath it does relax. What I love more the easy to use and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple foot bath that didn't have all the "bells and whistles". This was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: c7

product_meta.title: HoMedics Bubble Mate Foot Spa, Toe-Touch Control, Removable Pumice Stone, Fb-55
product_meta.description:
Treat your feet to a relaxing foot bath with HoMedics Bubble mate foot Spa that will soothe and rejuvenate tired and overworked feet. The foot Spa features a removable pumice stone for the ultimate foot Spa experience. The footbath was designed with raised nodes that soothes your feet. It also includes toe-touch control and a splash guard for convenience and ease of use. 

HoMedics is about creating a healthy home environment that helps you relax your body, de-stress, and simplify your life. Since our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated, and refined a remarkable line of personal Wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in massage. Our products combine our advancements in the field of massage with modern technology to create a rewarding, satisfying massage solution that puts you totally in control, and totally relieved of stress and Aches.
feature_bullets: REJUVENATES OVERWORKED FEET: Treat your feet after a long day of work with this Bubble Mate Foot Spa. The massage water jets and raised nodes work to revive your feet by gently massaging and soothing your tired, overworked feet
REMOVABLE PUMICE STONE: Pamper your feet and shape them to perfection with the included callus removing stone

SPLASH PROOF: The foot spa was designed with an integrated splash guard that helps prevent splashing and spills. This makes it easy to carry your foot spa without worrying about spilling the water, for a mess free experience
TOE-TOUCH CONTROL: The foot spa was designed with a convenient toe-touch control that allows you to turn it on and off without getting your hands wet.
HOMEDICS: HoMedics is about creating a healthy home environment that helps you relax your body, de-stress, and simplify your life

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
